title: Promptopia
description: Promptopia facilitates creative prompt management and sharing, focusing on secure authentication, efficient operations, sleek design, collaboration, and high-performance deployment.

title: Flipcart Clone
description: Crafted an immersive Flipkart clone using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB. Utilized Material-UI for aesthetics, Redux for state management, ensuring scalability. GitHub and Vercel deployed.

title: React Admin Dashboard
description: Crafted for visually appealing and dynamic dashboard experience with seamless collaboration and immersive design, leveraging Tailwind CSS and Syncfusion.

title: Ecommerce-app
description: App gives an immersive shopping experience, featuring a fully-functional shopping cart.

title: Recipe App
description: App facilitating seamless recipe search and discovery, enhancing culinary experiences effortlessly.
